name: incomprehensibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being impossible or extremely difficult to understand: He worried about the document's sheer incomprehensibility. The film is chopped and edited to the point of incomprehensibility. See
incomprehensible
More examplesFewer examplesThe near incomprehensibility of the instructions made assembling the desk a nightmare.What she most remembers about the school is the sheer incomprehensibility of some of its routines.The song was about the incomprehensibility of death.
